title: Swarna Kamalini Stud Earrings: A Touch of Timeless Elegance
materials: natural Emeralds (round cut). Meticulously crafted with traditional Hyderabadi polish for a radiant
features: These exquisite earrings feature a captivating floral design, drawing inspiration from the lotus (Kamalam). A central arrangement of four emeralds is surrounded by a halo of glittering diamonds, set in an intricate openwork gold setting. The filigree detailing adds a touch of vintage charm.
colors: with the vibrant green of emeralds providing a striking contrast and the dazzling white of the diamonds adding brilliance.
occasions: Perfect for festive occasions like Diwali
or any special event where you want to make a statement. Equally suitable for adding a touch of South Indian elegance to your everyday attire. Can be styled with modern outfits.
description: These Swarna Kamalini studs offer a unique blend of traditional design and modern appeal. The use of high-quality 22K gold and natural gemstones ensures lasting beauty and value. The intricate filigree work showcases exceptional craftsmanship, making these earrings a true heirloom piece. Symbolizing purity and beauty, the lotus design adds a layer of cultural significance.
